messages.title: £10billion extra for schools
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats will reverse severe cuts by investing an extra £10billion in schools. We should be investing in our children's futures, not damaging them.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reverse severe cuts by investing an extra £10billion in schools and recruit 20,000 more teachers nationwide.
Stop Brexit to address climate emergency, properly fund schools and the NHS, and create opportunity for all.

issues.brexitEurope: A vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to stop Brexit. Once we stop Brexit, we can tackle the climate emergency and inequality, properly fund schools and the NHS, and create opportunity for all.
issues.economy: Boris Johnson and Nigel Farage's plan to crash the UK out of the EU without a deal would be catastrophic for our NHS, jobs, and the economy.
issues.education: Invest an extra £10billion in schools. Recruit 20,000 more teachers nationwide. £10billion extra cash injection for schools.
issues.environment: Once we stop Brexit, we can tackle the climate emergency...
issues.governance: People are fed up with the Brexit chaos.
issues.health: Once we stop Brexit, we can... properly fund the NHS...

images.caption: People are fed up with the Brexit chaos. It has become a national embarrassment.
